channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Use community queries to hunt more effectively across email and collaboration threats
item.description: In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity, staying ahead of threats is a constant challenge. Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR provides security teams with powerful tools to proactively search for threats, detect anomalies, and respond swiftly to incidents—even automatically. One of the most valuable and insightful resources within advanced hunting is the community queries feature. This collaborative repository can enhance your threat-hunting capabilities, streamline investigation processes, and empower your security operations center (SOC) team members with easily accessible sh...
